simulation.engine
Class Vector

java.lang.Object
  simulation.engine.Vector

public final class Vector
extends java.lang.Object

A 2-dimensional vector containing an x and y coordinate.

Author:
Jacob Taylor

Vector

public Vector(java.lang.String string)
Constructs a new Vector based on the supplied String . The String should be one created by the toArchiveString(); if it isn't erratic behavior and possible exceptions could result.

Parameters:
string - - the archive string from which to create the new object.

withMagnitude

public Vector withMagnitude(double mag)
Get a vector with the same angle as this with a certain magnitude. If the magnitude is negative, the vector will have an inverted angle and have a magnitude equal to mag's absolute value.

Parameters:
mag - the new magnitude
Returns:
the resulting vector
